title: ettanai piravigaL
sahitya:
ettanaiyO piravigaL eDukka vaittAi ayyA innumirakkam varavillaiyA ayyA


anupallavi

  siddhanE pirappilA shiva paramporuLE muttanE mutti tarum mudalvanEyaranE


caraNam    piraviyin shikharamAm mAniDap-piraviyaip-peTrum payanillAdu pIDaiyAi-pOvadO 
turavigaL pOTriDum tonmarai yOgiyE dhUmati shUDiya tUyavanE ennai
